WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS 1100Z TO 2000Z DAILY
   26 AND 27 NOV BY M/V GOLDEN ARCUS AND
   M/V SILENCIO IV
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-47.23S 040-49.88W, 21-47.64S 040-48.33W,
   21-49.57S 040-48.89W, 21-49.16S 040-50.46W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 272100Z NOV 22.
